text: Another Woman is a 1988 American Canadian psychological drama movie directed by Woody Allen and stars Gena Rowlands, Gene Hackman, Ian Holm, Mia Farrow, Blythe Danner, Betty Buckley, Sandy Dennis, Frances Conroy, Philip Bosco, Harris Yulin. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1988 drama movies Category:1980s psychological movies Category:American drama movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Another Woman (1988 movie)
